job_details.Functieomschrijving:
In the role of Gen AI Software Engineer (Quality Engineering), you will be responsible for spearheading the development and implementation of testing frameworks and quality assurance processes for our GenAI services. Your expertise will be vital in creating a robust, scalable, and reliable quality engineering strategy that aligns with the innovative nature of GenAI., * Design, develop, and maintain comprehensive test automation frameworks for GenAI services to ensure quality, performance, and scalability.
     * Identify and mitigate the unique challenges associated with testing and validating LLM-based solutions.
     * Work collaboratively with the development team to integrate quality processes into the CI/CD pipeline, ensuring early detection and resolution of issues.
     * Establish quality metrics and benchmarks for continuous monitoring and improvement of GenAI services.
     * Lead and mentor a team of quality engineers in best practices and advanced testing methodologies specific to AI and machine learning.
     * Influence and establish a culture of quality-first mindset across engineering teams.
     * Stay updated with the latest trends and technological advancements in AI quality assurance to continually enhance our testing strategies.
job_details.full_text:
Gen AI Software Engineer (Quality Engineering)

In the role of Gen AI Software Engineer (Quality Engineering), you will be responsible for spearheading the development and implementation of testing frameworks and quality assurance processes for our GenAI services. Your expertise will be vital in creating a robust, scalable, and reliable quality engineering strategy that aligns with the innovative nature of GenAI., * Design, develop, and maintain comprehensive test automation frameworks for GenAI services to ensure quality, performance, and scalability.
     * Identify and mitigate the unique challenges associated with testing and validating LLM-based solutions.
     * Work collaboratively with the development team to integrate quality processes into the CI/CD pipeline, ensuring early detection and resolution of issues.
     * Establish quality metrics and benchmarks for continuous monitoring and improvement of GenAI services.
     * Lead and mentor a team of quality engineers in best practices and advanced testing methodologies specific to AI and machine learning.
     * Influence and establish a culture of quality-first mindset across engineering teams.
     * Stay updated with the latest trends and technological advancements in AI quality assurance to continually enhance our testing strategies.

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on developing and implementing testing frameworks for GenAI services, specifically mentioning LLM-based solutions and advanced testing methodologies for AI. This aligns with the GenAI Engineer profile's emphasis on building and maintaining production-grade systems, albeit from a quality engineering perspective.

phrases: spearheading the development and implementation of testing frameworks
creating a robust, scalable, and reliable quality engineering strategy
Design, develop, and maintain comprehensive test automation frameworks for GenAI services
Work collaboratively with the development team to integrate quality processes into the CI/CD pipeline
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe the creation, maintenance, and integration of software systems (test automation frameworks, quality processes) into development pipelines, which are core to software development.

phrases: testing methodologies specific to AI and machine learning
job_tasks.justification: While not directly building models, the role involves testing and validating the output and behavior of LLM-based solutions and AI/ML models, which is intrinsically linked to the modeling process.

phrases: integrate quality processes into the CI/CD pipeline
continuous monitoring and improvement of GenAI services
ensure early detection and resolution of issues
job_tasks.justification: The focus on CI/CD integration, continuous monitoring, and ensuring early issue detection directly relates to the operational aspects of deploying and maintaining AI services in production.

phrases: aligns with the innovative nature of GenAI
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of the business context and the specific domain of GenAI services.

evidence: Stay updated with the latest trends and technological advancements in AI quality assurance to continually enhance our testing strategies.
Work collaboratively with the development team
Lead and mentor a team of quality engineers
Influence and establish a culture of quality-first mindset across engineering teams.
Identify and mitigate the unique challenges associated with testing and validating LLM-based solutions.
Establish quality metrics and benchmarks for continuous monitoring and improvement of GenAI services.
spearheading the development and implementation of testing frameworks
creating a robust, scalable, and reliable quality engineering strategy
